com.esri.mo2.map.elt
Class BaseBackgroundLayer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.BaseBackgroundLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
BackgroundLayer, Cloneable
public class BaseBackgroundLayer
extends Object
implements BackgroundLayer

The class provides a support of drawing background for the given Element object. The outline styles, background color, and gaps to the Element can be changed by its getting and setting methods.

See Also:
BackgroundLayer
